name: The Big One
description: Massive 8.2 magnitude quake strikes Tokyo metro. Early USGS and JMA telemetry show severe shaking near dense population centers.

name: Yellowstone Eruption
description: Thermal anomaly and ash plume detected over Yellowstone Caldera. Persistent NASA EONET thermal readings plus local seismic swarms.

name: Florida Super-Cane
description: Category 5 hurricane making landfall near Miami with sustained 180mph winds. Evacuation orders issued across Miami-Dade.
